options.description:
Change the potion trade of the first gibdo.
Note: Reload the room that you're in to have the change take
place. 
Warning: If you play in Randomizer, playing with the "Red potion"
option will put you out of logic since you don't always have
access to the blue potion before the red one.
options.name: Gibdo Potion Trade

description: Replace the N64 trade by the 3DS one
